author: Simon Difford
description: Coffee, vanilla, sweetness and sourness all in harmony.
name: Coffee & Vanilla Daiquiri
recipeIngredient: 60 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum (infused with vanilla)
5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)
22.5 ml Chilled water (omit if wet ice)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice & fine strain into chilled glass
